Virus Diseases/RNA Virus Infections/Mononegavirales Infections/Filoviridae Infections/Hemorrhagic Fever, Ebola
Virus Diseases/RNA Virus Infections/Hemorrhagic Fevers, Viral/Hemorrhagic Fever, Ebola
Record.Description: A highly fatal, acute hemorrhagic fever, clinically very similar to MARBURG VIRUS DISEASE, caused by EBOLAVIRUS, first occurring in the Sudan and adjacent northwestern (what was then) Zaire.
